channel.title: Google CTF on lavafroth
channel.description: Recent content in Google CTF on lavafroth

item.title: Treebox
item.description: This challenge asks for python code as an input, converts it into an AST (abstract syntax tree) and if there aren’t any function calls or imports, executes the code. Our goal here is to avoid explicitly calling any functions yet reading the flag located at flag. We also can’t import any modules explicitly. If we read the source code provided for the challenge, we can observe that the sys module is already imported.
